messages.text: Morning check-in. Chris is asking for an update. How's the day going?
Phase 1 code complete. Blocked on deploy — need Chris to clarify which repo is at clientlist.onrender.com.
New project: Social Media Dashboard for Fiona. Buffer API + custom approval workflow.
On it — scaffolding approval dashboard with post creation, platform selection, review workflow.
Buffer closed API access. Evaluating alternatives: Ayrshare, Late, direct integrations.
Recommend hybrid: deploy dashboard now for manual posting, integrate Ayrshare ($29/mo) for auto-posting by Monday.
Ayrshare jumped to $149/mo. Chris found Late (getlate.dev) at $33/mo. Evaluate it.
Late looks great! Covers all 4 platforms, no dev app approvals needed, clean API. $116/mo savings. Recommend it.
Green light on Late. API key provided. Wire it up!
Late integration complete! Dashboard deployed at thht-social.onrender.com. Auto-posting ready.
2pm check-in. Big wins: Social Dashboard deployed, Late integration complete, Fiona onboarded.
Social dashboard clean. Property Alerts blocked on listing data source. Ready for next task.
Chris setting up Canva API for Fiona. Building OAuth callback endpoint now.
Canva OAuth working! Fixed PKCE flow. Fiona now has full Canva access — templates, designs, assets.
Canva integration complete! Fiona has full toolkit: Social Dashboard + Late auto-posting + Canva access.
